column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Long Feng says : " Avatar , it is a great honor to meet you .
#Text=We have information that could defeat the Fire Nation !
#Text=" Long Feng says : " The Earth King has no time to get involved with political squabbles and the day to day minutia of military activities .
#Text=" Aang says : " This could be the most important thing he 's ever heard .
#Text=" Long Feng says : " What 's most important to his royal majesty is maintaining the cultural heritage of Ba Sing Se .
#Text=All his duties relate to issuing decrees on such matters .
#Text=It 's my job to oversee the rest of the city 's resources , including the military .
#Text=" Katara says : " So the king is just a figurehead .
#Text=" Toph says : " He 's your puppet !
#Text=" Long Feng says : " Oh , no , no .
#Text=His Majesty is an icon , a god to his people .
#Text=He ca n't sully his hands with the hourly change of an endless war .
#Text=" Sokka says : " But we found out about a solar eclipse that will leave the Fire Nation defenseless .
#Text=You could lead an invasion ... " Long Feng says : " Enough !
#Text=I do n't want to hear your ridiculous plan .
#Text=It is the strict policy of Ba Sing Se that the War not be mentioned within the walls .
#Text=Constant news of an escalating war will throw the citizens of Ba Sing Se into a state of panic .
#Text=" Jet says : " You have to believe me , they 're firebenders !
#Text=They wo n't stop until they win the War .
#Text=" Dai Li agent says : " Calm down , you 're safe now .
#Text=" Long Feng says : " Our economy would be ruined , our peaceful way of life – our traditions – would disappear .
#Text="
